LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Groyne_Helmet.label: "Groyne" helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Groyne_Helmet.description: An armored cover that provides driver protection without adequate optical manufacturing processes. It is bulky but does provide some durability.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Stahlhelm_Helmet.label: "Stahlhelm" helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Stahlhelm_Helmet.description: a civil frame module used for welding. But In fact, large quantities of them were flowing into the arms market and underwent certain bulletproof modifications.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_Groyne_Helmet.label: "Groyne" helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Module_Groyne_Helmet.description: An armored cover that provides driver protection without adequate optical manufacturing processes. It is bulky but does provide some durability.
LanguageData.DMS_Module_Stahlhelm_Helmet.label: "Stahlhelm" helmet
LanguageData.DMS_Module_Stahlhelm_Helmet.description: a civil frame module used for welding. But In fact, large quantities of them were flowing into the arms market and underwent certain bulletproof modifications.
